import { useMutation, useQueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query'
import axios from 'axios'

interface ProcessingRequest {
  text: string
  operation?: 'translate' | 'improve' | 'rephrase' | 'summarize'
  sourceLang?: string
  targetLang?: string
  domain?: string
  glossary?: Array<{ source: string; target: string }>
